---
title: vela completion
---

Output shell completion code for the specified shell (bash or zsh)

### Synopsis

Output shell completion code for the specified shell (bash or zsh). 
The shell code must be evaluated to provide interactive completion of vela commands.


### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for completion
```
